channel.title: Custom quest problem (repeat)

item.title: Custom quest problem (repeat)
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

[quote=“BorigTheDwarf, post:5, topic:439848”][quote author=Shadow742000 link=topic=542538.msg3975663#msg3975663 date=1334623095]
there is no c.nextchat thing, i want the chat to end right after it give the 100000gp, i thought all i did wrong was put break in the wrong place, i dont want your code, i want a fix… and btw (1305, 10) doesnt work, thats why i have to do it so many times.
[/quote]

You should be more grateful when people try to help you. Wanker. Also, you did put the break in the wrong place, unless that is the last case in the switch statement. Otherwise, you need to put the break AFTER the last ‘}’[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Custom quest problem (repeat)
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

That’s just adding a check. Ashton is showing you a way to add a check for dialogues so if one dialogue has been completed it won’t repeat. The reason it’s repeating is because once the dlongs are deleted, they no longer have 10, so that dialogue is no longer allowed to be sent.

However if you’re doing this then as long as the player is still logged in they won’t get that message. Ideally you should be using a player save (disconnections, power-outages, etc)

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Shadow742000 Shadow742000
item.description:
@Shadow742000 wrote:

why do i need talk == whatever? all i want is for the dialogue to pause and not repeat.

item.title: Custom quest problem (repeat)
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

case 666: if(talk==0) talk2("Come to me with 10 D-Longswords and ill give you", "100K Gold!", 2244); talk = 1; if(playerHasItem(1305, 10) && talk==1){ talk2("Thank you for your help!","Here's your money.", 2244); deleteItem(1305, 1); deleteItem(1305, 1); deleteItem(1305, 1); deleteItem(1305, 1); deleteItem(1305, 1); deleteItem(1305, 1); deleteItem(1305, 1); deleteItem(1305, 1); deleteItem(1305, 1); deleteItem(1305, 1); addItem(995, 100000); talk = 2; break; }
Not very practical or clean or proper conventions but hey it will probably work.

Also it is assumed you know how to declare a variable talk.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom quest problem (repeat)
item.dc:creator: @BorigTheDwarf BorigTheDwarf
item.description:
@BorigTheDwarf wrote:

Shadow742000:

there is no c.nextchat thing, i want the chat to end right after it give the 100000gp, i thought all i did wrong was put break in the wrong place, i dont want your code, i want a fix… and btw (1305, 10) doesnt work, thats why i have to do it so many times.

You should be more grateful when people try to help you. Wanker. Also, you did put the break in the wrong place, unless that is the last case in the switch statement. Otherwise, you need to put the break AFTER the last ‘}’

item.title: Custom quest problem (repeat)
item.dc:creator: @Skyro Arbe
item.description:
@Skyro wrote:

case 666: talk2("Come to me with 10 D-Longswords and ill give you", "100K Gold!", 2244); if(playerHasItem(1305, 10)){ talk2("Thank you for your help!","Here's your money.", 2244); deleteItem(1305, 10); // Should work. addItem(995, 100000); C.nextChat = #; } else { talk2("Sorry, you don't have 10 Dragon Longswords to continue. Get them and come back.", 2244); break; } }
Note: This code won’t work, i’ve just added whats needed. Now you need to put it in place and make it work. If you have anymore problems post back here.

Read full topic

item.title: Custom quest problem (repeat)
item.dc:creator: @Shadow742000 Shadow742000
item.description:
@Shadow742000 wrote:

		case 666:
			talk2("Come to me with 10 D-Longswords and ill give you", "100K Gold!", 2244);
			if(playerHasItem(1305, 10)){
			talk2("Thank you for your help!","Here's your money.", 2244);
			deleteItem(1305, 1);
			deleteItem(1305, 1);
			deleteItem(1305, 1);
			deleteItem(1305, 1);
			deleteItem(1305, 1);
			deleteItem(1305, 1);
			deleteItem(1305, 1);
			deleteItem(1305, 1);
			deleteItem(1305, 1);
			deleteItem(1305, 1);
			addItem(995, 100000);

break;
}

it says heres your money for like a split second then it goes back to the first talk2… please help!
